nodes.bodyText: Should fullcalendar be added to headscripts instead of an independent call?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,18 @@
+<!DOCTYPE html>
+<html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"
+      xmlns:th="http://www.thymeleaf.org">
+    <head>
+        <meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=UTF-8" />
+        <link media="all" href="/library/skin/tool_base.css" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" />
+        <link href="/library/webjars/fullcalendar/4.3.1/core/main.min.css" rel="stylesheet" />
+        <script src="/library/js/headscripts.js"></script>
+        <script src="/library/webjars/fullcalendar/4.3.1/core/main.min.js"></script>

nodes.bodyText: Is it best practice to redefine these here or pull them from the other property file where the tool itself is defined?
Not sure about that. I'd have to pull in multiple i18n bundles in the widget picker just to get the tool names. One to keep an eye on, probably. I may add a TODO on that piece.
